inn1.comm: pitches on a length outside off and swings away, the batsman leaves it alone
fuller this time and swings away like the previous delivery, the batsman watches it go through
this time it's on the stumps, the batman stays in the crease and defends it to off
he keeps it nicely in the channel outside off, Anamul stays patient and lets it go

was there an inside edge that saved the batsman! It was a good chance up delivery by the bowler, it pitched it full and that came in. Anamul was stuck in the crease and if there was not inside edge, he was a gonner.. That was a terrific change up delivery
starts off with a maiden as the batsman defends this length delivery to point
it's full and it's swinging away from the batsman, he goes after it for some reason and is beaten
this is better from Shamsur. He comes forward, watches the ball is moving away, and lets it go
and there is an outside edge this time, but I think he was in control of this. It skims along the surface, past the second slip, to third man
this one is too wide and swings further away! He bowled it with a grunt
bowls this one on a length and it doesn't swing, the batsman defends it towards midwicket
he continues swinging the ball away now, this one is full and shapes away nicely. The keeper takes it near his ankles after the batsman leaves it alone
good teaser from Perera, this one is full and shaping away.. the batsman comes forward and then decides late to let it go
another loose shot from the batsman! This is slightly short in length and he throws the kitchen sink on it,is beaten by the bounce...

big big trouble! The batsman dabs it to cover point and charges out of the crease, he was halfway down the middle when his partner told him to go back. Angelo Perera though wasnt able to pick it up cleanly. When he does, he fires a throw in, hits the stumps and gives away overthrow runs
this one cuts in from the pitch! the batsman had no idea how that came in such a long way, it's through to the keeper after bouncing over the stumps
another loose shot! Shamsur is being hurried into his shots. This was a length ball outside off and the batsman tries to drive it on the up, it just evades the outside edge
throws his bat again, a bit unnecessary i must say. There was width and he cracks it to third man, more of an outside edge than a controlled shot that one
this is short and wide, outside the wide marker, the batsman still chases it. It's a wide, leave it alone
stays on the back foot, rises with the ball and defends it to off
this time he gets it off the middle! There was width, yes, and he gets it off the middle, it rockets past point for the team's first boundary
full and wide delivery, it swings away and Shamsur swings his bat too... Another play and a miss.
the fine leg had come up, so Shamsur walks across the stumps to play a cute glance and misses again.. This is over the middle and leg stump, as he misses it.. Too much cuteness being attempted here
better from Shamsur this time. It's full delivery on off, he takes a forward step and cracks it through cover point for a conventionally hit shot.. nicely done
solid forward defence this time, he pushes it to cover
stays in the crease and opens the face of the bat late to push it behind point
short of length outside off, Shamsur waits on the back foot and cuts it straight to point
this one is close to off stump, the batsman defends it to cover and thinks about a single, but is rightly sent back
better now from Shamsur as he solidly defends this delivery back down the pitch
well bowled by Lakmal and well played by Shamsur, the length ball is defended down the pitch.. Four dot balls now
some width this time from the bowler and the batsman tries to cut it through point, but doesn't get hold of it.. straight to point
fuller delivery this time, aimed at off stump. Almost catches the batsman in the crease, but Shamsur manages to push it back to the bowler
starts off with a short of length delivery on off, the batsman defends it to midwicket off the back foot
good accurate start from Dammika. This is just outside off at 140 kph, the batsman pushes it to mid on
he gets his first runs with a lovely whip to deep midwicket! It was short of length outside off and he hops on his crease to get behind it, then whips it with quick wrist action
oh this one cut back in sharply! This hits the back thigh pad and lobs to the keeper, was always going over the stumps, but that surprised the batsman
now that last ball has created a doubt! He goes after this full delivery and plays inside the line! It flies past the outside edge

and Dammika has a wicket in his first over! It's stack overflow, the blue screen of death, core dump.. as they say it! Anamul played that lovely shot earlier in the over, then started playing loose shots. This one was short of length and rising outside off, the batsman plays a nothing poke away from his body and the outside edge flies waist high to the keeper. Can't say I didn't see it coming..
length delivery outside off, Shamsur takes a forward stride and leaves it alone
this is better from Shamsur. He comes forward and guides the length ball to third man for a single
a good first ball to Mominul! He slides this across the left-hander and almost draws him into a shot. The batsman belatedly pulls his bat out of the way
he comes forward and defends the length delivery to cover
length delivery outside off, he comes forward and defends it towards point
another solid defensive shot from Mominul, he pushes it to cover
short of length outside off, it skids and bounces extra too.. The batsman tries to punch it through covers and is beaten again
this one cuts in from wide outside off and goes past the inside edge.. stayed a bit low too..
and now past the outside edge! He tries to cut this length delivery - it's not short enough - and is beaten again
he walks across his stumps to work it to midwicket for a single. He exposed all the stumps right there
this was too full and on the pads, it's a gift for Mominul.. He frees his arms and flicks it through square leg for a boundary
he stays in the crease and defends the back of length delivery to point
some spin straightaway! The batsman tries to drive it though mid-on, but it hits his pads
this one spins down the leg side, is called a wide
this one is dropped halfway on the pitch, Shamsur slaps it to deep midwicket. I guess he missed out on that one, that was a rank bad delivery
lots of flight on this one, Mominul drives it to cover
slightly short this time and Mominul is quick to rock back and slap it through cover point for a boundary
tossed up delivery on off, he comes forward and defends it down the pitch
on the pads and it's flicked to fine leg for an easy single
he is beating them for pace here! This one skids after pitching and Mominul tries to push at it without getting anywhere close to the line, gets beaten
not this time though! Dammika pitches it a touch further and Mominul is comfortable to come forward and slice it through point.. All timing in this one and it's along the ground.. Nicely done
he tried to whip this through on side, but gets a leading edge towards mid-off.. That wasn't very far from the short cover fielder
oh this is nicely done too! He waited for the ball, then opened the face very late to guide it past the first slip fielder.. Very well controlled that one.. No chance for third man
the bowler attempts a yorker, but it's a low full toss that is pushed through cover for a couple
this one is on off stump and Shamsur allows it to come in, then clips it behind square on the leg side for an easy single
tosses it up and it's full too, defended back to the bowler
another one that is floated up to the batsman, defended again
he drives it inside out to wide mid-off for an easy single
flatter this time from Sena, the batsman defends it to point
he stays back, but it's not short enough to cut, he chops it towards point
he rides the bounce and chops it to the left of point for a quick single. The fielder gets a hand to it but is not able to cut that single down
he starts off with a short of length delivery outside off and Mominul slashes it to third man.. It was in the air for a bit
he walks across the stump to work it away to the leg side, gets an inside edge towards midwicket that gives him an easy single
another inside edge saves the batsman! Loud appeal from Thisara as Mominul goes across the line to flick this length delivery, he was lucky to get a thick outside edge.. Maybe it was a bit high too
length ball outside off, this time he lets it go through
some extra bounce from a length for Thisara.. The batsman gets hit high on the bat as he defends this
this one is on the middle and Mominul stylishly whips it to deep midwicket for a single
full and flighted on off, Mominul calmly pushes it to long off for a single
nicely bowled by Sena! Floated up, but not very full. The batsman defends it down the pitch
he tries to push it through cover, but gets an inside edge to midwicket
it's floated on the off stump and Shamsur goes for a slog sweep to deep midwicket
he squares the batsman up with the turn, Mominul is lucky to get some bat on it as that was heading for the off stump
he brings up the team's fifty with a calm push to long off
he stays in the crease and flicks it to deep midwicket.. Nicely done. They seem to have settled down now
well played by Shamsur too. He presses forward and pushes the length delivery to point
he gets a full delivery, but this one is like a late-over biff! He moves his front leg out and tried to crash it through extra cover, but hits it straight to mid-off
good single this time! He drops it towards cover and calls early
length delivery on off, Mominul comes forward and tickles it towards square leg with a turn of his wrists
he shuffles across and flicks the length delivery to deep square leg for an easy single
this one is on the pads and it's easily whipped away to deep square leg
tossed up full and on the middle stump line, the batsman comes forward and dabs it to the leg side for a single
quicker delivery on the stumps, Shamsur goes on the back foot and tucks it towards square leg for another easy single
tossed up on off, Mominul comes forward and smothers the spin
more good batting from Mominul, he defends it down the pitch again
now pulls out the sweep, he is right on top of this one as he plays it to deep backward square leg for a single
full and flat on the stumps, the batsman defends it back to the bowler
slows it down this time, the batsman defends it to cover
short and wide this time, the batsman stays on the back foot and punches it through to deep cover for a single
he stays on the back foot and works it away to the leg side for a single
too close to cut this one! He is beaten as this slides under his bat
better choice of shot this time as the ball is short enough to play the back foot punch.. Single to deep cover
short of length delivery outside off, Mominul opens the face to slide it down the third man for an easy single

Dammika strikes again! It's a short ball, the first one of the day.. And it was quick too. The batsman was sucked into playing a hook shot and was no way in control of that.. A deep square leg was placed for that exact shot and it just settles into his hands.. He didn't have to move an inch.. It's good when a plan comes together..Shamsur's scratchy stay ends.
Mushy gets off the mark first ball as he dabs the back of length delivery to midwicket
nicely climbs the bounce and pushes it past point to third man.. well played by the batsman there as there was not much room on that
he shuffles across the stumps to dab it to midwicket, there is a fielder there now, so no single
stays on the back foot and defends the length ball solidly down the pitch
this is on the pads and is easily tucked to short fine leg for a single
he allows the ball to turn in, then tucks it to square leg for another single
oh this is beautifully played! He waited on the back foot and played a late cut very fine.. This runs through to the boundary
follows it up with a sweep as Priyanjan bowls a fuller length on the middle stump line
Mushy dabs it to the gap at cover for an easy single
he waits on the back foot and punches it in front of square, to deep cover for a single
full delivery on the pads, Mominul tries to push it through midwicket, but is not able to beat the fielder
on the pads, this is not the right line from Dammika, it's easily flicked fine for a couple of runs
too straight again from Dammika! The batsman flicks it to midwicket again, where the fielder doesn't make a clean stop and allows a single
back of length, just outside off, Mushy waits and defends to point
fuller delivery aimed at off stump.. Mushy shows calm disposition, comes forward and defends that solidly
nicely done by Mushy again.. He waits for the ball - that actually came in too - and guides it down to third man for a single
too full and too much flight in that one, the batsman calmly pushes it through cover point for a single
the line is on the pads and Mominul sweeps it to deep square leg with ease
waits for the ball to turn and tries to clip it to leg side, but is not able to beat midwicket
spins in from outside off, the batsman allows it to come in, then dabs it to cover for a single
full and flighted, Mominul pushes it to long off to bring up his new high score in ODIs
he waits on that one... plays a cute little late cut, beats the short third man fielder.. Deep backward point runs in and does the clean up
slow and on off stump, the batsman has to wait for long time for the ball to come in, he then defends it
on the pads and the batsman is not able to get it away, hits it straight to short fine leg
some width here from Perera, Mominul goes back and chops it to deep point
oh nicely bowled.. this one is almost a yorker and Mushy digs it out well too

they all go up on an appeal for caught behind down the leg side! Good take by Chandimal I must say as this was full and quick.. But difficult to say from the replays.. The umpire thought it was off the pads.. He is probably right
he waits for this one to come in with the angle, dabs it to midwicket and takes a single
on the pads, he doesn't get any bat on that but it tickles to fine leg off the pads
comes forward and defends the length delivery to point

oh that is beautifully timed! It was length delivery, slightly wide, but he drove it with a lot of wrist action, just enough to beat the diving point fielder and it races to the boundary.. First fifty for Mominul
oh this is even better! It was full alright, but he comes on top of that nicely and creams it through wide mid-off
Thisara corrects his line and length, this time it's on off stump and short of length, the batsman defends it to point
nice and straight from Thisara again, defended down the pitch
goes deep in the crease and tucks it behind square for an easy single
oh that's a bad ball! It was short and down the leg side, the batsman just helped it on its way.. The fielder at fine leg.. Lakmal.. almost saves the run, but ends up pushing it over the line
he waits on the back foot and punches it straight to cover
full and on off, Mominul is playing much freely now. He slog-sweeps this in the air, but straight to deep midwicket
he stays on the back foot and punches this to cover
oh that's a full toss, the batsman misses out as he drives it straight down to long off for a single only
a loud appeal for lbw as Mushy misses his sweep and gets hit on the pads.. But this was always going down the leg side
oh this is a good strike from Mushy! He comes down the pitch and just chips it over the mid-off fielder.. It goes for a one-bounce four
now waits in the crease and turns the strike over with a dab to midwicket
full and flighted outside off, Mominul is at ease now, he crunches this to wide long off for a single

he waits for it to turn, tucks it to deep square leg and what do we have here!! A wicket out of nowhere again. Mominul was a touch slow to turn for the second and a great throw from the deep finds him short at the non-striker's end. Direct hit it was.. Sri Lanka have a bonus wicket as Mominul was looking so good. But great work by the fielder- Vithanage - there, he went for the non-striker's end smartly..This was shaping to be such a good innings
he pushes this one to deep cover for a single.. Mushy must be angry with him about that second run.
flatter and on the stumps, Mushy flicks it to square leg for a single
a full toss this time, the batsman punches it to long off for his opening runs
full and flighted on off, Mushy drives it to long off for a single
short and flat from Angelo, the batsman goes on the back foot and punches it to long off for a single
it's tossed up and Mushy chooses to go for a slog-sweep - ill-advised at this stage - but he plays it well and gets in the gap at wide mid-on
fuller delivery, the batsman jams his bat down and defends it to the off
full delivery,Naeem drive it straight to cover
he tries to punch this one through covers, but gets an inside edge to square leg
flatter and turning in, the batsman goes deep in his crease, then pushes it to long on
this one is fired down the leg side, easy call for the umpire
Mushy is lucky to get this boundary! He again goes for that slog sweep! this one is high, but not long enough, just drops between the two fielders in the deep before rolling to the boundary
he waits on the back foot and dabs it to cover for a single
allows it to turn in, then clips it to square leg for a single
skids this one on off stump, the batsman defends it off the back foot
that was a good bouncer this time! Naeem has to hop up to defend that, he plays it well in the end
fuller delivery aimed at off, the batsman comes forward and drives it to extra cover
another quick delivery, but slightly leg-stumpish.. The batsman clips it behind square for a single
a good ball on the stumps, slightly slower this time. Mushy defends it off the back foot
full delivery this time, the batsman is slow in coming forward, punches it back to the bowler
short of length delivery around off stump, the batsman pushes it to the left of point for a quick single
he stays calm and defends this one to point.. It stayed a touch low too, but it was comfortably handled
he picks up a single to fine leg as this is too straight, easily whipped off his hips
he pushes it to mid-off and calls for a run straightaway.. Angelo Mathews is a touch slow to get to the ball and they make it across in time
he is not able to get it away this time.. Dabs it to cover and thinks of a single, but the fielder is too close
and another good delivery, it's tight on off stump line, Mushy can only push it to point
back of length on off, the batsman defends it to midwicket
another good short ball by Dammika, the batsman tries to play a ramp shot, but makes no connection
he pushes this to the left of point for a quick single

and Dammika strikes again! And now Rahim is gone! This was short and wide and asking to be hit. Rahim does that part of the job well, but he hits it straight to the man at point. Maybe he wasn't able to control that extra bounce, but unlucky that he found the fielder there. Sena does well to hold on to that as it was hit pretty hard. Another wicket from nowhere. There is an air of unpredictability about how these wickets are falling when you least expect them
oh that's a good first ball to a new man! Short and aimed at the body.. Nasir was in trouble, he gets an outside edge that falls short of the first slip and slides down the boundary
another short ball, it comes slightly slower off the surface, allows the batsman to get on top and work it away to the leg side for a single
full and flighted, it's driven to the left of cover and the fielder does well to keep the batsmen to a single
he waits on the back foot and pushes it to the left of point for a single
floated up from round the wicket, the batsman drives it to deep cover with ease
this one turns down the leg side and all the batsman has to do is get some bat on it, they take three fine on the leg side
slower delivery on off, the batsman waits for it to come, then punches it to deep cover
punched to long on for a single this time
he keeps persisting with the short-ball tactic, but this one is not the right one, it's down the leg side
some width on this one, Naeem gets on top of that and slides it to third man easily
it was full and it was asking to be driven, that's what Nasir does, but hits it straight to cover
another tight delivery from Dammika, the batsman can only defend it to cover
he keeps it around off stump but this time the batsman manages to pick up a single to third man

oh that was almost an amazing catch by Lakmal at third man!! The batsman ramped the short ball, but he hit it straight towards the third man.. Lakmal ran in and dived forward, but that just dipped on him. Bonus four runs too.. But what an effort
attempts a slower ball, the batsman though comfortably pushes it to mid-off
short and wide, he doesn't get complete hold of it, but manages to squeeze it to deep cover
he keeps it tight around off and the fielder at point does well to dive across and prevent a single
he waits in the crease and defends the length delivery to point
good delivery this one, heading for the off and middle stump, the batsman defends it to mid on
there was some power behind that shot! No half measures as they say. He stood tall and cracked that wide delivery through point with a wild flay of his arms
good first ball from Lakmal. It was short and rising outside off, the batsman stands tall and defends it
another short ball, outside off. The batsman is surprised by it and lets it go through.
length delivery on off, good line from Lakmal. The batsman can only come forward and defend
oh good bowling this by Lakmal, he is not giving an inch to the batsman. This is tight on the off stump line, the batsman can only defend it to point
he bowls a low full toss and that pressure means that the batsman wasn't expecting it, fails to take advantage of it. The batsman pushes it back to the bowler
this one is down the leg side, it flicks the thigh pad en route to the keeper. A maiden at this stage, well bowled Lakmal
he starts off with a poor delivery, bowls full down the leg side, it's an easy call for the umpire
short and wide, doesn't bounce much, so the batsman is able to climb on that easily and cracks it to deep cover
he waits on the back foot, but is not able to beat the point fielder with his late cut
back of length delivery on off, the batsman punches it to cover
he gets a lot of power behind that punch to cover, but it's hit straight to the fielder
that was a good slower ball and the batsman was almost sucked into it. He pushes it in the air towards cover, but it just drops short of the fielder
he skips down the pitch for the first time, but only manages a push to long off for a single
length delivery, still no escape for the batsman, he pushes it straight to midwicket
good short delivery on the body, the batsman finally manages to get a single to square leg for a single
short delivery this time, Nasir chooses to duck under it
slower delivery, but this is slightly on the pads, the batsman flicks it to fine leg for a single
another good short ball, the batsman ducks under it again
oh he is bowling very tightly here. Another good short ball, the batsman hops on his toes and drops it down on the pitch. Just two runs of that over
quicker delivery outside off, the batsman cuts it straight to short third man
goes deep in the crease and works it away to deep midwicket for a single
quicker outside off, the batsman goes for a cut, but misses out as this bounces a touch extra
full and flighted, the batsman pushes it back to the bowler
tossed up and full too, he finally gets to the other side with a push to long off
slower this time, the batsman dabs it to cover and thinks of a single, but the fielder charges in and cuts the chance down
he continues bowling good lines, the batsman drives it straight to mid-off
first show of intent against Lakmal as the batsman creates room and tries to slam it over the bowler's head, but can only get it as far as mid on
bowls a full toss, but again, Naeem hits it straight back to the bowler
he charges down the pitch, makes room too, but is not able to get enough power behind that as he hits it straight to mid-off
he stands tall and dabs it to midwicket for a single
bowls it full and on the middle stump, the batsman jams his bat down and plays it towards long on for a single. Another good over by Lakmal
fuller delivery from round the wicket, the batsman pushes it softly to mid-off for a quick single
charges down the pitch but doesn't get hold of the shot, in the end, it doesn't go anywhere, drops well short of deep midwicket
he waits for this delivery and clips it past midwicket for a single
full delivery on the stumps, the batsman drives it past the bowler for a single
on the pads, he attempts a sweep but is not able to beat the man at short fine leg
jumps out of the crease, but the bowler slows it down and the batsman can only punch it through midwicket for a single
another tight delivery by Lakmal, but the batsman creates room by arching backwards and beats the point fielder for a single
he gets another full toss - third one I think - and he again hits it back to the bowler. These ones should be taken care of, as Lakmal is not bowling many loose balls
the pressure is showing up now as he tries to throw his bat by charging out, makes no connection
full delivery on the leg stump line, the batsman digs it out to mid on for a single

finally a boundary off Lakmal, Nasir breaks the shackles. It was a full delivery outside off, Nasir lofts it over the infield - he didn't get hold of it - but there was enough to take it over the boundary
short delivery, the batsman clips it to deep square leg for a single
he prematurely steps out of the crease, allows enough time to the bowler to adjust his length, then the leading edges takes it to mid-off
on the pads this time, the batsman flicks it to deep square leg, the batsmen decide against taking on Vithanage
makes room and tries to crash it through cover, but hits it straight to cover
waits in the crease and whips it to deep midwicket for a single
full delivery on the pads, this one is softly pushed to deep square leg and this time they will get back for the second

and there is a wicket off the last ball of the Powerplay! They had done everything right - not too many runs, but they didn't lose a wicket - but Naeem decides to make the most of the last ball. he charges down the pitch and tries to clear mid-off, but fails to do so. Easy catch in the end
the batsman waits in the crease and opens the face of the bat at the last moment to guide it down to third man
a good short ball for the new man. Mahmudullah gets into an awkward position, but manages to duck under it in the end
this one comes back into the batsman, who manages to tuck it to square leg for a single
oh that is a good shot! Only slightly short, but he swivels on his backfoot and slaps it behind square leg for a boundary
fuller delivery on off, he dabs it to cover but there is no single this time
this one is on the stumps, the batsman defends it to midwicket
bowls it slow outside off, the batsman has to push forward to reach that and he can only push it to point
length delivery outside off, Mathews is cutting down on the pace, but the batsman manages to push it to third man for a single
another single to third man, easily done by Nasir this time
another slower delivery outside off, Mahmudduah picks up a single to third man
and again, this is the fourth single to third man. Nicely controlled late cut by Nasir
full and down the leg side, easy call for the umpire
good pacy delivery by Prasad, this one was heading for the middle stump before the batsman brought the bat down to defend it
on the pads again, but Nasir fails to beat the man at short fine leg.. Hit straight to that fielder. A metre on either side and that was  a boundary
a good yorker this time from Prasad and all Nasir can do it dig it out back to the bowler
good tight delivery around off stump, the batsman stays in the crease and pushes it to deep cover for a single
good tight bowling from Dhammika, this one comes in after pitching. Mahmudullah is cramped for room and defends it down the pitch
he completes the spell with another tight delivery that is hit straight to mid-off. Excellent stuff by Dhammika on his ODI return
the batsman comes out of the crease early and Sena drops it short. Nasir can only tuck it to the leg side for a single
full and flighted outside off, the batsman squeezes it to deep cover for a single
oh that was a bad delivery, but again, the batsman fails to take advantage, hits the short ball straight to deep square leg
goes over the wicket and bowls it wide outside off, the batsman pushes it straight to mid-off
tossed up on off, the batsman flicks it fine on the leg side for a single that brings up the team's 200
tossed up on off stump, the batsman tries to run it down, but hits it straight to short third man

Lakmal finally gets something in that last column of his bowling figures! The one time Mahmudullah throws his bat at the length ball, he hits it straight to long on. That pressure was building for a while and it has consumed the batsman. There is a strange uneasy buzz around the ground because the runs have been hard to come by. Mahmudullah tries to break it with one shot and perishes
a good yorker to the new man, Gazi manages to squeeze it to deep midwicket
length delivery on off, the batsman defends it to point

another wicket! This is the big one. Nasir Hossain hits the full toss straight to midwicket. It's all falling apart. There had been so many full tosses from Lakmal that Naeem had failed to get away. This time, Nasir shows the right intent, but doesn't manage to beat the midwicket fielder, who takes a head high catch. Some luck with those full tosses for Lakmal, but I guess, you make your own luck by bowling well. That 250-run target is distant now
a sharp short ball to welcome the new batsman.. He took his eyes off and gets hit on the arm..
another full toss, this time hit to the midwicket fielder again

the first six of the innings! And it could have been a wicket too. The batsman came out of the crease and lofted it over wide long-on, great effort by the fielder but it was always going away from him
this one has turned in a mile, hits the pad. Loud appeal for lbw, but the umpire reckons this would have turned down the leg side
flatter and slower on off, the batsman stays in the crease and defends
this one goes straight on and the batsman, who was playing for the turn, gets beaten
and the second six of the over! Finally, someone gets hold of the shot.. The batsman charged down and send this miles high, but it didn't go long enough - enough to beat the long-on fielder though
he arches back and guides the short delivery to third man for a single
he bowls a wide yorker that the batsman hits straight to point
another good yorker on off by Lakmal, Gazi pushes it to midwicket, but that's straight to the man there, so no run
he makes room but doesn't get it off the middle, manages to push it down to long on

manages to get this one through the gap! It was full on off, the batsman drives it firmly through to deep cover where Vithanage makes a good diving save, however, the ball just rolls over to touch the line. Another welcome boundary
this was slow and short, the batsman charged down the pitch, was down too early, but still had time to swing it all the way over long on.. This is turning out to be a very very useful cameo from Gazi
another slow short ball, Gazi repeats the shot, but doesn't get the timing this time.. It drops short of the long on fielder
a good slower delivery from Mathews, the batsman is too early in his attempted guide to third man and is beaten
now a quick short ball, again the batsman fails to connect as it flies over the bat
another short ball outside off, the batsman flays his bat at that and gets a thick top-edge, but the third man is fine enough to cut it off
he bowls it full to Gazi this time, and the batsman punches it down to long off for a single. He will keep the strike
full delivery outside off, the batsman wanted to push it through off, but gets an inside edge down to long on for a single
he throws his bat at the length delivery by making room, but he makes no connection
he dabs it to cover and calls for a risky single, would have made it even if the fielder had hit
a very good yorker by Perera, it somehow misses the off stump..

it's the end of Gazi! He tries to play a dilscoop as the fine leg is up, but he exposes his middle and leg stump. This was straight and quick and once he missed it, it was all over. The arrangement of stumps is disturbed
oh that's a very good over now, he bowls a quick delivery across the batsman, who doesn't connect
meanwhile, he keeps bowling the slower balls. The batsman swings and misses it completely
another slower delivery from Mathews, the batsman tries to guide it to third man but gets an under edge to the keeper
short and wide, the batsman was ready for that and he slaps it over point for a boundary
a good slower yorker, the batsman digs it out to square leg for a single
slower ball on the middle stump, the batsman drags it to deep midwicket with a flat-batted swat
full and driven down the ground, mid-off dives across to cut it off and keeps them to two

inn2.comm: this one is on the pads, there was a bit of shape on that one, but hits the pads and they take a leg bye
good ball this one from Shafiul! Just short of length, shapes in to the batsman and bounces nicely to the keeper.The batsman leaves it alone
goes fuller this time but Lahiru finds it easier to flick this one in front of square leg for a couple
bowls this one across the batsman, this one keeps going away with the angle. Lahiru lets it go
he comes forward and just punches it behind point, that races to the boundary as there was a lot of timing behind that one.. No chance for the third man fielder, beautifully hit
he straightens his line and bowls on the stumps, Lahiru comes forward and defends solidly
that is a poor first ball. Short. Wide. But the batsman fails to take advantage, hits it straight to point
tossed up on the stumps, the batsman defends it down the pitch
again, the batsman comes out of the crease and reaches the ball to defend it down the pitch
quicker delivery on the off stump line, the batsman defends it from the crease
slower, shorter and a sligthly wide, the batsman chops it to point
he tries to rock back and look for the point boundary, but again chops it to the fielder
starts off with a length delivery on the middle stump line, Lahiru flicks it through midwicket and calls for a second run
he bowls it down the leg side, would have been a good ball to a right-hander, but a comfortable wide to a right-hander
oh he stands tall and just punches the short of length delivery towards point with a lot of timing, but fails to beat the man there.
he bowls a length delivery on off, no room whatsoever, the batsman defends it down the pitch
good work at first slip as the batsman gets a bottom edge down to the cordon
he comes forward and punches the full delivery past the non-striker, but doesn't get hold of it. The fielder at mid-off runs around and cuts it off
that was only slightly short and the batsman was quick to bring out the pull. He slaps it off the front foot, but there is protection at deep midwicket
short and very wide. The batsman was making room and gets toe end to the ball
he comes forward and defends this floater to the off side
he shapes to come out of the crease, but then stays back and defends it to the cover
there was not much room on this, but KJP manages to cut it between the two fielders at point for a quick single
flighted delivery on off, the batsman comes forward and defends to off
he looks to defends and then opens the face to push it to point
oh that has been whipped with some powerful wrists to the midwicket boundary by KJP. Not the ideal ball to start your over - full and on the pads
another full delivery, but this time it's outside off. KJP punches it to mid-off and calls for a quick single
better delivery on off, Thirimanne is looking very solid as he comes forward and defends this to off
another full delivery on off, Lahiru comes forward and uses his wrists to place it to the right of point.. No one moves, as he uses the pace of the bowler perfectly

similar delivery, and similar shot by Lahiru! He pushes it away from the body, plays it in the air and it flies towards the point fielder. Nasir, dived forward and didnt manage to hold on. That could have been a very important catch. It was hard, but should have been taken
on the pads, the batsman flicks it behind square for a single
slower on the middle stump line, the batsman waits and tucks it behind square for a single
oh KJP was itching to play some shots! He gets a filthy long hop and he rocks back to pull it over midwicket for a huge six
Gazi corrects his length, floats this one up and KJP has to defends
better bowling now, KJP shows more front foot defence as this one is floated up to him
he tries to come out of the crease, but Gazi shortens his length and KJP has to defend
better bowling this by Gazi, no room, perfect length. KJP defends
he gets one on the pads and fails to beat the man at short fine leg
better bowling by Rubel, this one is angled across the left hander and Thirimanne lets it go
this was beautifully timed, but the cover area is crowded now. Thirimanne moved forward and pushed this nicely, but it was straight to the man at cover
he stays on the back foot and gets an inside edge towards square leg. The batsmen pick a single
he gets a full delivery wide outside off and KJP goes for a lofted shot - very Sanath like - but he gets a toe-end to it and it just beats the man at mid-off
he waits for the slower ball and punches it towards cover. The fielder dives to his right and keeps the batsmen to a single
flighted and on a length, the batsman goes on the back foot and pushes it to cover
good flight by Gazi, the batsman comes forward and defends to off
this was floated out wide and KJP waits that extra moment to open the face late. It beats the man at backward point and they pick up a couple by the time he gets it back
on the middle stump line, KJP defends it down the pitch
oh this was wide outside off and spinning away, but KJP pulls it from there to midwicket. No run.
lovely delivery, it draws the batsman into a forward defensive poke, but spins past the outside edge. No wonder there is excitement among the keeper and the bowler
this one is angled across the batsman. Thirimanne pokes at it, attempting to run it down to third man, but it slips past the outside edge
keeps it outside the line of off, no movement for him. The batsman watches it go through
another one going across the batsman and it beats Lahiru again. He is not looking as solid as he was earlier.
slower delivery on off, the batsman comes forward and guides it to third man for a single
oi!! THat's a massive massive hit! More shades of Sanath. It was only marginally short and KJP was hell bent on murdering the ball, pulls it high and long over midwicket boundary for his second six
length delivery outside off, this time he chooses to defend it
slower and flighted outside off, the batsman comes forward and defends
on the pads this time, but Lahiru defends it back down the pitch
slightly quicker this time, the batsman watches it in time and defends
the batsman goes on the back foot and defends this solidly down the pitch
goes for a sweep for one that is flighted outside off, gets bottom edge to deep square leg
flighted delivery outside off, the batsman lets it go through
a soft dismissal first ball! The crowd roars. He comes round the wicket and Thirimanne just spoons it to short cover. It possibly stopped in the pitch a bit. But a big breakthrough for Bangladesh
tossed up delivery and Vithanage comes forward and defends it to midwicket
some turn too, the batsman though manages to push it to deep cover to get off the mark
oh this is lovely from Mahmudullah! It drifts in the air, grips the surface, then spins past the outside edge
tossed up further, the batsman comes forward and defends
quick feet by KJP. He comes forward and then quickly rocks back to chop that to point
he comes round the wicket and the batsman chops it to point
flatter and slower on off, the batsman comes forward and pushes it back to the bowler
he waits on the back foot and punches it to deep cover for a single
flatter delivery, again this stops on the pitch and KJP punches it almost all the way back to the bowler
he comes forward and defends the length delivery to point
he sweeps this from outside off to pick up a single and keep the strike
he waits for it on the back foot and punches it to deep extra cover for a single
on the pads and it's easily flicked on the leg side for a single
he steps out of the crease and drives it to long off for a single
this one keeps coming in with the arm and almost catches Vithanage in trouble as he looked to cut. He managed to get some bat on it
flighted down the leg side, he sweeps it to short fine leg
full and flighted on the middle, the batsman drives it back to the bowler
slightly short, the batsman turns it away on the leg side for an easy single
on the pads from round the wicket, easily worked away past square leg for a single
quicker delivery on off, the batsman defends it back to the bowler
too straight and the batsman easily tucks it behind square for a single

oh Vithanage tries to impose himself with a slog sweep, but gets a big top edge.. It floats towards deep midwicket, but just evades Arafat Sunny.. The fielder dives, but is not able to get to the ball. It rolls over the boundary
he waits on the back foot and punches it to deep cover for a single
slightly short, gives the batsman enough time to punch this, but he is not able to beat the man at cover
on the pads, he pulls out another sweep, but hits it behind square for a single
quicker and flatter on off, the batsman pushes it back to the bowler
slightly short and KJP rocks back to punch it to deep extra cover
full and quicker, the batsman is a touch late to bring his bat down as he plays it to point
quicker delivery on off, the batsman pushes it to point
another flatter quicker delivery on off, KJP defends it back to the bowler
fuller this time, the batsman comes forward and defends
lovely flight this time, it spins too, past the outside edge as the batsman is slow to come forward
he is back to the flatter trajectory. KJP defends
another good delivery outside off, KJP can only push it as far as short cover

Mahmudullah strikes again! Lovely delivery this one - flighted and on the middle stump line.. But an equally suicidal shot - he has been going for those slog sweeps and he goes for it again but misses it completely. The middle stump has been flattened.
tossed up delivery on off, the batsman nudges it to short fine leg with the turn
he is off the mark with a neat clip of his pads to deep midwicket
he comes down the pitch and looks to defend the tossed up delivery, gets an inside edge to square leg
another slog sweep, but this is safer as it was outside off. He hits it firmly to square leg, where the fielder gets a hand to slow it down
tossed up and he gets some spin, it goes to short third man off the outside edge
fuller and flighted on off, KJP comes forward and defends
flatter and quicker, good tight bowling this. KJP pushes it back to the bowler
slightly short this time, allows the batsman to go back and punch it to long on for a single
fuller delivery outside off, Chandimal easily sweeps it to fine leg for a single
short outside off, KJP goes deep in the crease and punches it to deep cover
some turn for Nasir too, this one is spinning towards the pads. The batsman runs it down to short fine leg
tossed up outside off, the batsman eases it to long off for a single
some spin for Sunny too, it comes into the lefthander, who gets an inside edge to short fine
slower and on the off and middle line, the batsman pushes it back to the bowler
fuller and on off, KJP is being kept quiet. He defends again
he skips down the track and flicks it, but straight to midwicket
lovely delivery! The batsman was playing for the turn, but this keeps going on with the arm, gets the outside edge and runs down to short third man
slightly on the pads and KJP goes to the other side with a paddle to short fine leg
tossed up outside off, he paddles it from outside off and plays it fine for a couple
flatter delivery on off, the batsman waits and defends it down the pitch
this one turns down the leg side, but Chandimal is good to push it in the gap at deep backward square leg
he skips down the track, but is not to the pitch of the delivery. Defends it down the pitch
slightly short, KJP goes back and punches it down to long on for a single
tossed up on the pads, the batsman defends it down the pitch
on the pads, the batsman works it behind square for an easy single
tossed up outside off, the batsman leans forward and pushes it to cover
comes down the pitch, but gets an inside edge to short fine leg. They take a single
he comes down the pitch and almost yorks himself. But manages to push it to long on for a single
this a big shot, it's a good shot too! Chandi skips down the pitch and gets under the ball to loft it through wide long on for a one-bounce four. Good shot to break the shackles
tossed up outside off, KJP keeps concentrating, he pushes it to point
flatter and quicker on off, he looks to play the cut, but has to push it back to the bowler
he punches this one down to long on for a single
big spin, but it's down the leg side and is called a wide
flatter and quicker on the middle stump, the batsman flicks it behind square for a single
he stands tall and punches the wider delivery to deep cover
slower and tossed up on off, Chandimal plays straight, pushes it down to long on
slower and tossed up on off, Chandimal drives it straight to cover
comes out of the pitch and drives it to cover again
fuller and flighted on off, he manages to go straighter this time, picks up a single to long off
this is an interesting shot! It was slightly short and the batsman chooses to go over mid-off.. He has been playing the cut mostly, but goes over the infield this time
quicker delivery, he dabs it to the left of midwicket for a quick single
flatter and quicker on off, it stops on the pitch again as Chandi pushes it in the air towards long off
flatter and quicker.. Easily worked to square leg by Chandimal
full and flighted on the pads, the batsman whips it to deep midwicket for a single
it's spinning down the leg side and Chandimal does well to get some bat on it. The fielder at short fine leg gets a hand to it to slow it down, but they come back for a second
full and on off, this is eased to long on with a straight bat
quicker and shorter on off stump, KJP makes room and cuts it to backward point
he comes forward and defends the length delivery to backward point
slower and tossed up on off, the batsman comes forward and pushes it back to the bowler
he dabs it the gap at cover and calls for a quicks single to bring up the team's 100
fuller delivery outside off, he pushes it to point but turns down the single
fuller and flighted on off, the batsman pushes it to midwicket
full and flighted on the middle stump, he uses his wrist to flick it powerfully behind square and he comes back for a second
he stands tall and punches this down to long on to bring up his half-century. A very well constructed innings  during which he has had to curb his enthusiasm a bit.
tossed up outside off, the batsman reaches the pitch of the delivery and drives it to long off.
tossed delivery on off, the batsman pushes it to the left of the bowler
he allows the ball to come in, then dabs it towards midwicket for an easy single
it comes in after pitching and the batsman clips it to deep square leg with ease
tossed up delivery, the batsman pushes it back to the bowler
fuller delivery on the stumps, the batsman defends it to the cover
starts off with a good short of length delivery outside off, Chandimal pushes it to cover point
he pushes it softly towards mid-off and calls for a quick single
oh a loud appeal for caught behind! Everyone went up for this one.. It looked out to me too.. Extra pace, extra bounce.. goes past the outside edge. I heard something.. The umpire doesn't agree
short of length delivery on the stumps, the batsman dabs it to the leg side
he waits for the length delivery, opens the face late to run it down to third man
slower delivery this time, the batsman has to wait an extra second and he pushes it to cover
slow and flighted outside off, Chandimal pushes it to midwicket with the turn
he comes down the pitch, but the bowler bowls it short and on the pads. Chandimal manages to flick it to deep square leg for a single
slightly short by the bowler, but KJP was on to the pull shot very quickly, hits it to deep midwicket
flighted delivery on the middle stump, the batsman defends it to cover
on the pads, the batsman misses his clip shot and it rolls to the short fine leg area
full delivery, it's pushed to mid-off for a quick single
length delivery outside off, the batsman pushes it straight to point
short delivery this time from Rubel, it doesn't get too high and Chandimal pulls it to deep square leg for a single
first show of intent from KJP.. He skips outside the track, makes room and cracks this one with a lot of power through cover
length on the pads, the batsman pushes it to midwicket
good ball it would have been to a right hander, but to a lefty, it's a wide down the leg side
on the pads again, he tries to drag it past the short fine leg fielder, but doesn't manage to beat him.. Picks up a single though
oye, almost a great catch by Anamul! Chandimal got a thick outside edge and Anamul flies to his right, but is not able to hold on
he comes down the pitch and works the length ball away behind square for a single
he clips it behind square on the leg side and calls for a quick single
plays straight, he punches this to wide long on for a couple of runs
slower this time, the batsman dabs it to point for an easy single
full and flighted, the batsman drives it down to long on for a single
on the pads, Chandimal easily clips it behind square for a single. That's the end of Mahmudullah's spell too
short of length outside off and Chandimal manages to crack behind point for a couple
full delivery outside off, the batsman drives it on the up, straight to cover
bowls a slower one outside off, the batsman dabs it to cover
and another slower ball, the batsman waits for this one and pushes it to midwicket for an easy single
on the pads, the batsman misses his flick shot but picks up a leg bye
this is nicely done! It was only marginally short, but Chandimal knew there was a gap at deep square leg. He picks it up from outside off and places it right in the gap. It races to the boundary
this is full and flighted on the pads, the batsman is not going to leave this ones.. he goes for a sweep, gets a thick top edge, but it carries all the way  over the line..his third six
short and wide outside off, but KJP drags it over midwicket for a single
he steps out of the crease and drives it down to wide long on for an easy single
o this is powerfully smashed through midwicket! It was not too far from the midwicket fielder, but he had no chance. He skipped down the track, reached the pitch of the ball and gave it his all
comes out of the crease again and drives it down to long off for a single
flatter and shorter, the batsman punches it straight to midwicket
length delivery on off, the batsman calmly pushes it to extra cover for a single
fuller delivery on the off and middle line, the batsman whips it to deep midwicket with the angle
oh he spotted that slower delivery and misses out. It was hit towards point with some wrist work, but he finds the fielder
another slower delivery on the pads, this time he clips it to deep square leg and they come back for the second
another six! This is full and on off and middle line, but he just uses his wrist to impart kinetic energy to the ball. It's just lifted, swatted, murdered over midwicket for a six
oh this is more power! Just short and wide and he kills it past point with a thunderous crack of the whip
this one turns in from off stump and the batsman nudges it behind square for a single
oh this lands safely! KJP was not in control of that at all. He wanted to go over long on, gets thick leading edge that lands behind mid-off.. very very lucky there
meanwhile, Chandimal just keeps turning the strike over. He calmly punches the shortish delivery to deep cover
some defence now as he leans forward to push it back to the bowler
slightly short on off, the batsman stays on the back foot and punches it to deep extra cover
slower delivery, the batsman stays calm and defends it down the pitch
on the pads, it's nudged past midwicket for a single
he skips down the track and pushes it back to the bowler
wide outside off, the batsman stays in the crease and cuts it to deep point
allows the ball to turn in and plays it to square leg for a single
flatter delivery, stays low too, but the batsman digs it out
this time he pushes it to long off for a single
tossed up outside off, Chandimal stays calm, pushes it to long on for a single
tossed up on off, he reaches the pitch of the ball and pushes it to long off
tossed up delivery on the stumps, another easy run to long on. Chandimal on 49 now
another easy run, he pushes it to wide long off
oh that's a beautiful short to bring up his half-century! He has been happy to take singles, but this time takes advantage of the short length, and cracks it through cover for a boundary
allows it turn in and plays it behind square on the leg side for a single
tossed up delivery on the stumps, Chandimal pushes it to long on for a single
he comes forward and defends the flighted delivery to midwicket
plays it to deep midwicket with the turn
he comes down the pitch and very easily flicks it to deep midwicket
slightly on the pads, the batsman looks to paddle it fine but is not able to beat the man at short fine
tossed up on off, more defence from KJP as he pushes it back to the bowler
a quick run for Chandimal as he dabs this one to cover and takes off immediately
runs are coming very easily, this one is pushes to extra cover
tossed up delivery on the middle, again clipped to deep midwicket for a single
oh man! He keeps hitting these big sixes. He sees the flight and picks it up from outside off and sends it over deep midwicket

and he gets to his century - his first in ODIs - with a neat push to long off. What a knock this has been! He has been aggressive, but mostly patient. A knock of responsibility in the absence of the big guns
he almost drives it back to the bowler
he makes room by moving away and punches it hard towards cover, but straight to the fielder
fuller delivery on the pads, it's driven down to wide long on for a single
lovely straight drive for a single to long off
he just slaps it as soon as that pitches, but good work by the fielder at cover who manages to stop it by getting his body behind it
on the pads, it's turned away to deep backward square leg for a single
slower and flighted on the middle, it's pushed back to the bowler
oh this is a full toss wide outside off, KJP chases it, gets a thick outside edge for a boundary.. this is very quickly running away..

oh he runs out of luck this time! Possibly he was just tired as he throws his bat at the length ball - played completely across the line - and misses it completely. The off stump takes a beating. But what an innings this has been. He got his maiden hundred on a day his team needed extra responsibility. Well played KJP
bowls a length ball on off with a grunt, the batsman defends it down the pitch
another short of length delivery on off, Mathews stands tall and defends it
he pushes it to cover point off the back foot for an easy single
a good short ball, but an equally good response from Chandimal. He swivels and pulls it from outside off to deep midwicket boundary - all along the ground
tossed up outside off, the batsman pushes it straight to cover
rocks back to punch it through cover, but good work by the fielder at cover who stops it and prevents the single
goes on the back foot and punches it to deep midwicket
comes down the pitch, but the bowler slows down the pace.. in the end, Chandimal pushes it back to the bowler
stands talls and punches it down to long off for a single
full and flighted, defended with ease

and Rubel gets another one! This was quick, this was pacy, this had extra zip and extra bounce. the batsman wanted to guide it to third man but is surprised by the pace on that, it takes a thick outside edge straight to the keeper. Anamul doesn't show any reaction at all first.. but I guess it was because he was confident that it was out, not the other way
and another outside edge, but this one is between the keeper and the first slip.. Wouldn't have been a catch, as this is off the bottom edge
a quick short ball and a super pull shot too, whacked to deep backward square leg boundary
oh this is a good shot! It was short and wide and he climbs it nicely, but hits it straight to point
he teases the batsman with a full delivery but Priyanjan leaves it alone
he bowls it in the channel outside off. Priyanjan calmly lets it go through
flatter delivery, it's punched back to the bowler
straight delivery, Angelo pushes it back to the bowler again
waits on the back foot and pushes it straight to cover
some turn, the batsman gets squared up in his defence, but Priyanjan calls him for a quick single
stays on the back foot and pushes it to cover
tossed up delivery on off, the batsman pushes it to mid off
he charges down the pitch, but Rubel bowls it wide.. The ball flies to third man off the outside edge
another thick outside edge to third man for a single now
he cracks it off the back foot with some power, but straight to the man at point
back of length delivery on off, the batsman glides it to third man for an easy single
a loose drive from the batsman as he pushes outside the line of the ball
he dabs it to cover for a single to keep the strike
tossed up delivery on the stumps, the batsman pushes it to long on for an easy single
he comes down the pitch and punches this full delivery down to long off for a single
this is nicely driven through the covers, just a mere push, but it's neatly in the gap
on the pads, he pushes it straight to midwicket
he nudges it to square leg for another easy single
oh this is beautifully driven down the ground! He came out of the pitch and punches it down the ground past the non-striker! It was in the air for a bit, but no chance for the bowler
fuller delivery on the stumps, the batsman flicks it to square leg for another easy single
oh this is crashed through covers! He just finds the gap at extra cover to perfection
length delivery on the pads, he changes the strike over with a neat nudge to square leg
length delivery on off, he dabs it towards mid-on and calls for a single belatedly, but makes it well in time
short of length delivery on the off, the batsman guides it to third man for a single
he starts off with a yorker that is easily dug out by Priyanjan
on the pads and it's easily flicked to fine leg for a single
bowls a slower short ball that is easily paddled down fine to leg side
shortish delivery outside off, the batsman looks for a single with a guide to third man, but hits it straight to point
short delivery outside off, the batsman drags it from outside off for a single to deep square leg
length delivery outside off, the batsman pushes it to mid-off
he works this away to square leg for another easy single to bring the scores level
he appeals for lbw as Angelo offers no shot! But this is spinning down the leg side
and he finishes the series with style! Smashes this turning delivery over midwicket with a powerful hit to wrap the win! And the series 3-0
